events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and still have not received any tracking updates or delivery confirmation for my package.
The case has been categorized as a potential delivery delay due to the customer's report of missing tracking information and late shipment.
An agent has been assigned to investigate the missing delivery status and contact the shipping provider for more details.
Hello! I’m here to help you with your order delay. Could you please confirm your order number so I can look into it quickly?
To assist you better, I need the order ID and the date of purchase. This will allow me to track the shipment status more effectively.
Thanks for your quick response. The order number is 123456789, and I bought it on May 28th. Please let me know what you find out.
We have contacted the delivery service and they confirmed an unexpected delay in your shipment. We expect your order to arrive within the next 3-5 business days.
I appreciate the update, although I’m a bit disappointed with the delay. Please keep me informed if there are any further changes.
Thank you for your patience. Your case is marked as resolved since the delivery is now scheduled. Do reach out if you need further assistance.
Just following up to ensure that you have received your order and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
